data.title: Obituary for Gordon Orr, Sr.
meta_keywords: funeral home in Boca Raton FL

data.text:
Gordon Orr, 84, of Boca Raton, FL and Pigeon Forge, TN, passed away on March 28, 2016 in Sevierville, TN.

Gordon was born in Kingston, NY, on December 16, 1931.

He was retired from IBM, and a former partner of Cypress Pine Nursery and Best Of Christmas.

He is pre-deceased by Father: Judson Orr, Mother Charlotte (Martinez)Orr, Brothers: Joseph and Bernard; his first wife: Joan (Dickson) Orr and his 2nd Wife: Shirley (King) Orr. He is survived by Sister: Angela (Orr) Baldwin, Sons: Gordon Orr Jr. & wife Kathi (Aber) Orr; and Paul Orr & wife Vicky (Rossok) Orr, Daughter: Deborah Orr Dettman & husband Thomas Dettman, Grandchildren: Michelle Orr Faulk, Amanda Dettman, Brian Orr, Michael Orr, Matthew Dettman, Kyle Orr, Great Grandchildren: Austin Williams, Dylan Lanier, Addison and Logan Faulk, Noah and Ryder Dettman, William Orr and expecting Baby Orr. Step Children: Frank Layton III and Pamela (Layton) Jackson and husband Ken, Step Grandchildren: Rachel, Sarah, and Tabitha Jackson.

In lieu of flowers, family would like donations to go to: http://4p-supportgroup.org/fundraising/ or https://give.psp.org/
